# Tables Test

## Simple Table

| Header 1 | Header 2 | Header 3 |
|----------|----------|----------|
| Cell 1   | Cell 2   | Cell 3   |
| Cell 4   | Cell 5   | Cell 6   |

## Table With Alignment

| Left | Center | Right |
|:-----|:------:|------:|
| L1   |   C1   |    R1 |
| L2   |   C2   |    R2 |

## Table With Formatting

| Feature | Status | Notes |
|---------|--------|-------|
| **Bold** | *Done* | `code` |
| [Link](https://x.com) | ~~Removed~~ | Test |

## Table With Long Content

| Description | Details |
|-------------|---------|
| This is a very long cell that contains a lot of text | And this one has even more content that might wrap |

## Single Column Table

| Item |
|------|
| One  |
| Two  |
| Three |

## Empty Cells

| A | B | C |
|---|---|---|
| 1 |   | 3 |
|   | 2 |   |
